data.comment: The big names in today's match at BC Place have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Vancouver in the half of Los Angeles.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Los Angeles at BC Place.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
Vancouver to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
In the minute 5, Vancouver are coming forward and Fredy Montero gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vancouver.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in Los Angeles.
In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tori Penso signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 10, Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
Christian Torres of Los Angeles gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Vancouver at BC Place.
In the minute 13, Los Angeles's Latif Blessing misses with an attempt on goal.
Tori Penso awards Vancouver a goal kick.
Vancouver's Cristian Dajome gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Los Angeles goal kick.
Tori Penso signals a Vancouver throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 16, Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tori Penso awards the away team a throw-in.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 18, Los Angeles are caught offside.
Vancouver take a 1-0 lead thanks to Lucas Cavallini.
Cristian Dajome with an assist there.
In the minute 31, Vancouver are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Free kick Los Angeles.
Tori Penso awards Vancouver a goal kick.
Free kick for Vancouver in the half of Los Angeles.
In the minute 39, Vancouver drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Los Angeles's Jordan Harvey breaks free at BC Place. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Vancouver at BC Place.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Vancouver.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Tori Penso.
In the minute 42, In Vancouver, Leonard Owusu of Vancouver is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Vancouver are pushing forward but Cristian Dajome's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Los Angeles goal kick.
In the minute 43, Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
Tori Penso signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
Tori Penso awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Vancouver.
Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of Vancouver.
Bob Bradley (Los Angeles) is making a first substitution, with Adrien Perez replacing Christian Torres.
In the minute 47, Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 49, Free kick Vancouver.
Eddie Segura (Los Angeles) has received a yellow card from Tori Penso.
Throw-in for Vancouver at BC Place.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vancouver.
In the minute 54, Tori Penso signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
Throw-in Vancouver.
Tori Penso signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Vancouver's half.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vancouver are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Vancouver at BC Place.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
Lucas Cavallini puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
In the minute 59, That's a fine assist from Fredy Montero.
Los Angeles have a goal kick.
Tori Penso signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
In the minute 65, Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tori Penso signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Los Angeles close to the penalty box.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Tori Penso.
Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 70, Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
In Vancouver Los Angeles attack through Mohammed El Munir. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Vancouver at BC Place.
In the minute 71, Los Angeles make their second substitution with Kwadwo Opoku replacing Bradley Wright-Phillips.
Erik Duenas is replacing Dejan Jakovic for the away team.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
In the minute 72, Vancouver's Cristian Dajome misses with an attempt on goal.
Tori Penso awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
Tori Penso signals a Vancouver throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The home team replace Russell Teibert with Ryan Raposo.
Tosaint Ricketts is on a sub for Fredy Montero for Vancouver.
In the minute 77, Danny Musovski (Los Angeles) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Tori Penso signals a throw-in for Los Angeles, close to Vancouver's area.
Bryce Duke is replacing Francisco Ginella for the away team.
In the minute 79, Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
Los Angeles have been given a penalty...
In the minute 83, Goal! Los Angeles now trail just 2-1 thanks to a penalty from Eduard Atuesta.
Vancouver's Evan Bush has been booked in Vancouver.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 87, Cristian Dajome for Vancouver gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vancouver.
Free kick Vancouver.
In the minute 88, Michael Baldisimo is on a sub for Cristian Dajome for Vancouver.
Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
Janio Bikel for Vancouver has been booked by Tori Penso and receives a first yellow card.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
Tori Penso signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
Tori Penso will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of Vancouver.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Tori Penso.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tori Penso signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tori Penso awards Vancouver a goal kick.
That's full-time at BC Place. The final score is 2-1.
Erik Duenas (Los Angeles) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
